title: "Mobile AI Market to grow by USD 39.91 billion between 2023 to 2028, Globally at 26.78% CAGR - Technavio"
excerpt: "NEW YORK, Jan. 29, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The mobile AI market is estimated to grow by USD 39.91 billion from 2023 to 2028, according to Technavio. The market is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 26.78% with a YOY growth rate of 26.33% during the forecast period. However, the growth momentum will progress."
